entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
